## StructureGroup.defaultPageTemplate property

Default Page Template.

All items contained in the Structure Group which don't have a (default) Page Template set explicitly inherit their setting from the Structure Group. The Structure Group itself may inherit its default Page Template setting from its parent (Structure Group or Publication).

**Signature:**

```typescript
get defaultPageTemplate(): Link | undefined;
```
